#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>

#define MAXN 10002
#define debug if(0)

using namespace std;

int n, m;
int num[MAXN];

int main() {
	for(int i = 0; i < MAXN; i++) num[i] = i;
	for(int i = 4; i < MAXN; i += 2) num[i] = 2;
	int raiz = 101;
	for(int i = 3; i < raiz; i += 2)
		if(num[i] == i)
			for(int j = i * i; j < MAXN; j += i)
				if(num[j] == j) num[j] = i;

	int casos;
	scanf("%d", &casos);
	for(int caso = 0; caso < casos; caso++) {
		scanf("%d", &n);
		int last = -1;
		m = n;
		while(m != 1) {
			if(num[m] != last)
				n = (n * (num[m] - 1)) / num[m], last = num[m];
			m /= num[m];
		}
		
		printf("%d\n", n);
	}
	
	return 0;
}
